DOC.brief_summary: This single center , open label , randomize , parallel group single dose intravenous ( i.v . ) administration study . The subject randomize receive single dose OxyNorm® 2.5 , 5 , 10mg .
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetic ( PK ) Study OxyNorm Injections Chinese Patient
DOC.detailed_description: After 7 day screen period , Eligible Patients randomize 1 3 group , begin treatment single dose OxyNorm® 2.5,5 , 10mg .
DOC.criteria: Patients tumor pain / postoperative pain , subject pain caused disease ; Patients age ＞30 ≤ 60 year ; Body weight ≥ 45kg , BMI range ≥19 , < 24 ; Karnofsky score ≥ 70 ; Expected survival 3 month ; The result liver function kidney test must meet following criterion : ALT、AST within upper limit normal value range factor 2 , TB、BUN、Cr within upper limit normal value range factor 1.25 ; The electrocardiogram examination result normal ; Patients must give write informed consent prior trial , capability complete every required test . Have hypersensitivity history opioids ; Have know hypersensitivity composition study drug ; Patients likely paralytic ileus acute abdomen perform operation abdominal region； Patients respiratory depression , cor pulmonary , chronic bronchial asthma ; Patient unable stop take monoamine oxidase inhibitor trial period time lapse less 2 week since drug withdrawal ; Patients hypercarbia ; Patients biliary tract disease , pancreatitis , prostatic hypertrophy , corticoadrenal insufficiency ; Patients alcoholism drug abuse history ; Positive antHIV syphilis antibody test result ; Urine screen study positive opioids , barbiturate , amphetamine , cocaine metabolite , methadone , diazepam cannabinoids ; Donated 400 mL blood blood product within 3 month prior start study , donate 200 mL blood blood product within one month prior start study . Subjects participate clinical research study within two month study entry . Patients currently take opioids .
